title: Higher fitness level can determine longer lifespan after age 70

title_detail.value: Higher fitness level can determine longer lifespan after age 70

summary: Researchers have uncovered one more reason to get off the couch and start exercising, especially if you're approaching your golden years. Among people over age 70, physical fitness was found to be a much better predictor of survival than the number of traditional cardiovascular risk factors.
